name: GraalOnline Zone+
description:
Download Graalonline Zone+ for free! Also check out GraalOnline Era+ and GraalOnline Classic+ which are free for a limited time!

GraalOnline Zone is back - a massively multiplayer arcade battle game for iPhone, iPad and iPod touch!

Enter battlefields joining hundreds of other players for an unique game play experience, using dual-stick controls and powerful weapons.

GraalOnline Zone was the very first MMO for iPhone and iPod touch and is now back with squads, missions, many weapons and planets!

NEW: Squad PvP - Conquer and protect planets!
NEW: Robot Pets - They follow you and can be programmed!
